"'Strong'" is a song by Robbie Williams, released as the third single from his
1998 album, [[I've Been Expecting You]] in early 1999. The song managed to break
into the top five in the United Kingdom. The b-side is the live version of "Let
Me Entertain You" recorded at the 1999 BRIT Awards, the performance was included
on the single in the Enhanced Section. During his live performance at Knebworth,
Williams and the crowd all sang "Strong" in an attempt to break the biggest
number of people doing karaoke world record.
